title: Notice under section 342 of MMC Act and notice under section 44/69 of MR & TP Act 1966 duly signed by owner/NOC Holder
clause_text: Notice under section 342 of MMC Act and notice under section 44/69 of MR & TP Act 1966 duly signed by owner/NOC Holder. Structural audit report/Statutory Notice issued by MCGM/MHADA Photographs showing condition of building as under: Front roadside view from ground to top floor in one or more photographs as possible. Plan showing block plan, location plan and all the details existing on site
section: Repairs to be carried out can be categorized as detailed below:
